price: Hiç şüphesiz siz de, Allah’tan başka ibadet etiikleriniz de Cehennem'in odunusunuz. Siz oraya gireceksiniz.
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ وَمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: innakum wamā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi ḥaṣabu jahannama antum lahā wāridūna
